meanings: (좋아하여) like, love, be fond of, be attached to
(유행·의견·규칙 등을) follow, (충고 등을) act (up)on, (formal) heed, (규칙 등을) obey, comply (with), abide by, conform to[with]

meanings.meaning: it had a counterbalancing disadvantage in...

vlive.korean: 먼저 따르고 시작하겠습니다. I will pour it in and get started. 듣기 View video V PICK! : [박우진] 우리 우진이 떡볶이 먹는 거 1102만번만 봐주세요 (Woojin’s eating show)
vlive.english: I will pour it in and get started.

vlive.korean: 되게 선생님 같고 따르고 싶게 되네요. you make me want to listen to you because you look like a teacher. 듣기 View video EMMA BEAUTY : 야밤에 치킨먹방? 걱정마요 치느님 근육으로 보내줄게!
vlive.english: you make me want to listen to you because you look like a teacher.

vlive.korean: 저의 뷰티 습관들은 지속적으로 조금씩 따르고 있어요. Usually beauty habits are continuously carried out in small amounts. 듣기 View video 카모마일T (Chamomile_T) : 카모마일T의 뷰티 Q&A 시간! / Chamomile_t's beauty Q&A
vlive.english: Usually beauty habits are continuously carried out in small amounts.

vlive.korean: 넘칠 것 같은데 그러면 어디 좀 따르고 해야 될 것 같은데 - 좀 마셔볼래? I think it'll overflow. Pour some out - Do you want to drink some? 듣기 View video V COOKIE : [Full]MXM's SUMMER VACATION WEEK - MXM X 여름방학 스페셜위크
vlive.english: I think it'll overflow. Pour some out - Do you want to drink some?

vlive.korean: 일단 6개 따르고. Let's pour six glasses first. 듣기 View video V COOKIE : [Full] GFRIEND’s - 여자친구 X 같이먹어요

examples.korean: The murders all seem to follow a (similar) pattern. 듣기 Add to Wordbook 그 살인들은 모두 하나의 (비슷한) 패턴을 따르고 있는 것으로 보인다. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary

examples.korean: She is following her usual policy of ignoring all offers of help. 듣기 Add to Wordbook 그녀는 모든 도움 제의를 무시하는 자신의 평상시 방책을 따르고 있다. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: She is following her usual policy of ignoring all offers of help. Add to Wordbook

examples.korean: I always try to follow my parents' wishes and be an amenable child. 듣기 Add to Wordbook 나는 늘 부모님의 바람을 따르고 유순한 아이가 되고자 노력한다. 절대어휘 5100
